Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: DELETE from [dbo].[Product] where ProductId=@ProductId RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: delete from [dbo].[Users] where RoleId in (select RoleId from UserRoles where UserIsActive=0) RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: insert into [dbo].[Feedback] values (@ProductId,@UserId,@Feedback,@Rating) RETURN

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: MAX

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN if @PaymentType ='CashOnDelivery' Begin insert into [dbo].[Payment] values (@CardNumber,@ExpiryDate,@CVV,@PaymentType,@Amount) end
if @PaymentType='CreditCard' Begin insert into [dbo].[Payment](CardNumber,ExpiryDate,CVV,PaymentType,Amount) values(@CardNumber,@ExpiryDate,@CVV,@PaymentType,@Amount) End
IF @PaymentType='DebitCard' Begin insert into [dbo].[Payment](CardNumber,ExpiryDate,CVV,PaymentType,Amount) values(@CardNumber,@ExpiryDate,@CVV,@PaymentType,@Amount) End
END
RETURN

HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
select * from Product where Name like '%'+@ProductName+'%'
RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
insert into [dbo].[DeliveryDetails] values (@ProductId,@OrderId,@DeliveryStatus,@DeliveryDate)
RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT @param1, @param2 RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: update [dbo].[Product] set Name=@Name, Rating=@Rating, ManufactureDate=@ManufactureDate, CartDescription=@CartDescription, ShortDescription=@ShortDescription, Image=@Image,MRP=@MRP, DealPrice=@DealPrice, SavePrice=@SavePrice, NoOfStock=@NoOfStock RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: update [dbo].[UserAddress] set UserId=@UserId, Address1=@Address1, Address2=@Address2, City=@City, State=@State, Pincode=@Pincode RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * from Users where RoleId in(select RoleId from UserRoles where @RoleNumber=RoleNumber) RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * from Users where RoleId in(select RoleId from UserRoles where @RoleNumber=RoleNumber) RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT product.Name, product.DealPrice, product.Image, useraddress.Address1, useraddress.Address2, useraddress.City, useraddress.State, useraddress.Pincode, payment.Amount, payment.PaymentType, orderdetails.Quantity, DeliveryStatus, DeliveryDate from [dbo].[DeliveryDetails] deliverydetails inner join [dbo].[OrderDetails] orderdetails on deliverydetails.OrderId=orderdetails.OrderId inner join [dbo].[Product] product on deliverydetails.ProductId=product.ProductId inner join [dbo].[UserAddress] useraddress on useraddress.UserId=orderdetails.UserId inner join Payment payment on payment.PaymentId=orderdetails.PaymentId where orderdetails.UserId=@UserId RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT Rating,Feedback from [dbo].[Feedback] RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ViewFeedbackDetailsByAdmin]
AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: select OrderDate,Quantity,Amount from [dbo].[OrderDetails] o inner join [dbo].[Payment] p on o.PaymentId=p.PaymentId where UserId=@UserId and ProductId=@ProductId RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * from [dbo].[Product] RETURN

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ViewProducts]
AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
select * from [dbo].[Product] inner join WishList wishlist on product.ProductId=wishlist.ProductId and wishlist.UserId= @userId
RETURN
